attributes.action: stop refuse collection during rush hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do refuse collection have to happen first thing in the morning.  The bin lorries have no care for the traffic that they are holding up.  I have been stuck in traffic jams up to 3 miles long, just because a rubbish truck has stopped on a junction.  Why add to the jams in the morning, start collection at 10am
